name: Malpractice
description:
NOTE

Best played fullscreen because somebody made the game at 1920 x 1080. Ouch.

CONTROLS

Click Patients to select them. Then click to assign them to a bed.

Patients will receive treatment once in a bed and cannot be moved.

Selecting a bed will show an option ‘Malpractice’ which will allow to free up that bed for a more deserving patient.
